mean_cn: n. 赞助人，倡导者，提案人，担保人；  vt. 发起，倡议，做…的保人，赞助，资助
mean_en: a person or organization that pays the cost of an activity or event (such as a radio or television program, sports event, concert, etc.) in return for the right to advertise during the activity or event
sentence: 'Thanks to all the sponsors for the support! ' said the host.
sentence_trans: “感谢所有赞助商的大力支持！” 主持人说道。
